body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Scott Butler and I work for CarZap, a leading online car dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I please have your name so I can address you properly?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amanda. Can you please provide me with your phone number, just in case we get disconnected?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you. One more question, Amanda. Could you confirm your email address for us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is amanda.roberts@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Amanda. We will look into the billing issue you have raised.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Is there anything else you'd like us to address while we have you on the line?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Amanda. We will reach out to you with an update soon. Have a great day!
